Name: Moonfall
About the game: SUMMARY: This is an old-school 2D RPG in the vein of Skyfall, Last Heroes and Fantasy Heroes. Humans and elves have battled against each other for decades until humans, led by Queen Azalia, finally got their victory, scourging all the elves from the world. At least that is the story they tell... Join three seemingly unrelated characters as their decisions unknowingly intertwines their fate with the fate of the world and all life as they know it. FEATURES: Dynamic party system, play the game as different characters in the order you choose until they're finally all together Quest Journal to keep track of all your mainquests and sidequests Choose between three difficulty modes Explore the world to find secret rooms to be rewarded with the treasures they contain Mouse support Explore lush enviroments from forests, caves, ruins and more MORE COOL GAMES: / / /
